text: This is historical material , " frozen in NN . " The web site is no longer updated and links to external web sites and some internal pages will not work . Members : The NN task force is a task force of the whole council , which includes members from business , NN , JJ and civic organizations . NN NN Task Force Member List History : The task force decided to focus on four areas of policy development : • NN NN Principles . These principles provide the Council with a shared statement on NN NN and guide the Council 's more in - depth discussions of NN NN policies and approaches . View Principles . • Technology Working Group . This group examined the various types of technologies that are currently available , under development , or anticipated that MD VB reduce NN gas NNS , as well as examined various policies or incentives that MD foster the development and dissemination of these technologies in this country and abroad . Working Group Tri-chairs : General Motors , NNP Resources Institute and the U.S. Department of NNP • Working Group on JJ , Regulatory , and Voluntary Measures . This group examined a broad range of JJ instruments , regulatory approaches , and voluntary steps that MD be taken to reduce NNS of NN gases . These MD include tradeable permits ; tax credits / deductions for investing in improved technologies ; NN taxes ; mitigation measures for JJ or regional dislocations ; partnerships among the investment and insurance communities , NN , and industry ; various regulatory approaches ; and voluntary initiatives . • Working Group on Cross- cutting Policies . Policies were identified to reduce NNS of NN gases while RB furthering progress in other areas of sustainable development . This working group provided a focus for drawing linkages between the NNP NNP Task Force and the Council 's other task forces ( NNP Management , Metropolitan / Rural Strategies for Sustainable Communities , and International ) and for identifying those policies that MD have benefits in more than CD area . Other areas of activity include : • Demonstrating the Implementation of NN Gas Reduction Policies and Activities • JJ outreach activities including community forums , the creation of a website , providing NN to the NN , and giving speeches and presentations on NN NN policies and activities . • Working with the Council 's Evaluating Progress Working Group to identify indicators and measures for tracking progress in addressing the issue of NN NN . Progress Report : The NNP task force sent a letter to the NNP in November 1997 ( Press Release 11/26/97 ) outlining its JJ product : a set of NN principles which were agreed upon to VB the task force in its policy deliberations . In the letter , the co-chairs of the Council stated : " This consensus statement about NN policy from industry , JJ , citizen and NN and local leaders is , as far as we are aware , the JJ such agreement on NN policy . " The principles call for incentives for early NN , international commitments , accountability , flexibility , strong measures to encourage technology , and fairness . Working group meetings began in February 1998 . • 1 . The Working groups developed a set of recommendations to accelerate the development and deployment of NN - friendly technology , principles for early NN to reduce NN gas NNS , and identified steps that MD be taken to foster broad - VBN community participation to realize the benefits of NN protection . 2 . The NNP Task Force transmitted the Early NNP Principles to the NNP ( Transmittal Letter to the NNP ) in October 1998 . text: MSNBC ’s Chris Hayes and NNP Velshi moderate NN forum with presidential candidates and NBC NNP ’ Lester Holt visits Alaska during the weeklong series NNP Roker Is in Greenland on NNP Mission to NN Melting Glaciers for NNP in NNP Series NNP Roker has trekked to the Arctic yet again — this NN for a NNP mission in Greenland to VB the effects of NN NN on the rapidly melting glaciers , and how NN levels are rising as a result . Starting Sunday , NBC NNP , MSNBC , Telemundo and NBC NNP Digital will dedicate the entire week ’s programming to the NN NN , showing how rapid NNS in our environment are affecting us here in the U.S. and in the rest of the NN . During the series , NBC Nightly NNP anchor Lester Holt will report from Alaska , where he lived as a NN while his father served in the U.S. Air Force . He will show how NN NNS are melting the NN ’s famed Portage Glacier and thawing the permafrost , which countless communities depend on to survive . “ We ’re seeing a shift in our very NN of NN because of NN NN , ” Roker , 65 , tells NNS . “ We ’re not trying to frighten NNS . ( AP ) — A federal appeals NN on Friday dismissed a lawsuit by 21 young NNS who claimed the U.S. NN ’s NN policies and reliance on fossil fuels harms them , jeopardizes their future and violates their constitutional rights , potentially dealing a fatal blow to a JJ - running NN that activists saw as an important front in the NN against JJ degradation . NNP NNP Summit in NNP NNP , which failed to elicit ambitious commitments from the NN ’s biggest polluters . Yet the report underscores just how costly delaying NN will be . Thus far , the NN ’s oceans have been the quiet hero of our VBG NN . They have absorbed about a quarter of the NN dioxide NNS have pumped into the atmosphere since the dawn of the industrial revolution , and 90 % of the resulting heat . “ But it ca n’t keep up , ” VBD Ko Barrett , the deputy administrator for research at the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration and a vice chair of the Intergovernmental Panel on NNP NNP , or IPCC . Now , however , the massive NN sheets in Greenland and Antarctica have taken over as the largest contributors , and they are increasing NN levels faster than ever . ( Creatures that can’t relocate , IN corals , MD simply be eradicated . ) Some animals will thrive in their JJ homes and others will hit dead ends , forcing fishing industries to adapt . But on the whole , unmitigated NN NN will decrease the potential catch of JJ fisheries by 20 % , the report concluded . It emphasized the NN to slash NN gas NNS , and to reduce other stresses on marine animals to give them breathing room to adapt to NN NN . There is no NN - size - fits - all approach to making coastal communities more resilient , Cheong VBD , but governments MD VB by improving early warning systems for disasters , encouraging residents to plan for NN NN when they rebuild , or , in some NNS , consider retreating altogether . The report highlighted the NN to start adapting now for an uncertain future . “ We owe it to our NNS and future generations to plan for resilient communities while we can , ” VBD Jack Ainsworth , executive director of the California Coastal Commission . “ History will judge us harshly if we do nothing or take halfhearted steps . ” In Oppenheimer ’s view , the U.S. is particularly far behind . The National Flood Insurance Program gives NNS an incentive to remain where they will be vulnerable to future storms , and the NN ’s reactive approach means that there is often no NN for NN until after a disaster has struck . “ These communities along the coast are basically sitting ducks , ” he VBD . But there are RB reasons to be hopeful . The ocean holds the potential to accomplish roughly a quarter of the NN gas reductions needed to meet the Paris NN targets , according to a report released Monday by the High Level Panel for a Sustainable Ocean Economy , a group of NNS and NN leaders convened by the NNP Resources Institute . For instance , seagrass meadows , salt marshes and mangrove habitats can sequester huge amounts of what NNS call “ blue NN . ” Preserving and restoring them yields other benefits too , IN buffering coastlines from storms and serving as nurseries for economically important fish . Oceans can RB VB by providing NN - friendly foods . As the IPCC ’s last major report on land use pointed out , eating beef and other land - VBN meats is a significant driver of NN NN . But fish is a green alternative . JJ fisheries are already overexploited . But researchers VBP that smart management MD boost yields and be sustainable . “ You can VB more out of the ocean if you just pay attention and manage it properly , ” Matthews VBD . RB so , there ’s no escaping the grim picture painted by the IPCC report . If NN NN continues unabated , “ the consequences for humanity are sweeping and severe , ” Barrett VBD . “ What ’s at stake is the NN of ecosystems , wildlife and — importantly — the NN we leave our NNS . ”
